Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.description: Enable/Disable logging activities with embedded workflow execution
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.inputs: <inputs><INP_PAUSE_WF_START class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_WF_START><IIIIIIIIIIII class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</IIIIIIIIIIII><INP_EMAIL_ID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><INP_TEST_LOGGING class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</INP_TEST_LOGGING><INP_PAUSE_WF_LOGGING class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_WF_LOGGING><INP_WF_NAME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">WF_CONDITIONAL_LOOP_TEST</INP_WF_NAME><INP_WF_XML class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"><inputs><INP_EMAIL_ID>test@commvault.com</INP_EMAIL_ID><INP_LIMIT>4</INP_LIMIT><INP_DELAY>2</INP_DELAY></inputs></INP_WF_XML><INP_WF_ENGINE class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.ClientEntity" _list_="false"><clientName /><clientId /></INP_WF_ENGINE><IIIIIII class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</IIIIIII></inputs>
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.name: WF_LOGGING
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.variables: <variables><VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_PAUSE_STRING class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">.</VAR_PAUSE_STRING><VAR_WF_STATUS class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">COMPLETED</VAR_WF_STATUS><VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_DATE_STR class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_STRING_TO_CHECK class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></variables>

children.name: INP_PAUSE_WF_LOGGING

inputs.val: <inputs><INP_EMAIL_ID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_EMAIL_ID}</INP_EMAIL_ID><INP_STATUS class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_WF_STATUS}</INP_STATUS><INP_JOBID class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId}</INP_JOBID><INP_WORKFLOW_NAME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/workflow/workflowName}</INP_WORKFLOW_NAME><INP_START_TIME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/startTime}</INP_START_TIME><INP_FAILIURE_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE}</INP_FAILIURE_MESSAGE></inputs>

Activity.description: creates a super process group
Activity.name: ProcessBlock

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="logger.info("INFO: pb_status : [" + xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status} + "]");

if (!xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status}.equals("COMPLETED"))
{
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS", "FAILED");
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE", xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_failiure_message});
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_STATUS = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS") + "]");
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE") + "]");
}" /></inputs>

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

Activity.description: creates a super process group
Activity.name: ProcessBlock

onEnter.script: workflow.setVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE","PHASE START : [" + xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId} + "][" + xpath:{/workflow/system/workflow/workflowName} + "][" + xpath:{/workflow/system/startTime} +"] : TEST LOGGING "); logger.info("INFO: VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE : [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE") + "]");

Activity.description: turns off all logging, except for errors, for current job
Activity.name: DisableLogging

inputs.val:
<inputs><inputXml class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"><TMMsg_CreateTaskReq>
<taskInfo>
<associations>
<clientName/>
<workflowName/>
</associations>
<subTasks>
<options>
<workflowJobOptions/>
</options>
<subTask>
<operationType>WORK_FLOW</operationType>
<subTaskType>ADMIN</subTaskType>
</subTask>
</subTasks>
<task>
<initiatedFrom>COMMANDLINE</initiatedFrom>
<policyType>DATA_PROTECTION</policyType>
<taskFlags>
<disabled>false</disabled>
</taskFlags>
<taskType>IMMEDIATE</taskType>
</task>
</taskInfo>
</TMMsg_CreateTaskReq></inputXml><escapeXml class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</escapeXml><commandArgs class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">-associations/clientname "xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_8/pb_workflow_engine}" -workflowName "xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_8/pb_workflow_name}" -workflowJobOptions "xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_8/pb_workflow_xml}"</commandArgs><sessionOptions class="workflow.types.cmd.SessionOptions" _list_="false"><useImpersonatedAccount class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</useImpersonatedAccount><tokenFile class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><token class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_8/pb_token}</token></sessionOptions></inputs>

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="File file = new File(commvault.cte.workflow.WorkflowRegistry.getInstance().getLoggingDirectory(), "workflowEngine.log");
Scanner scanner = new Scanner(file);
String flag = "pass";

int lineNum = 0;
while (scanner.hasNextLine()) 
{
	String line = scanner.nextLine();
	lineNum++;
	if(line.contains(xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_STRING_TO_CHECK})) 
	{ 
		logger.info("ERROR: Found string [" + xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_STRING_TO_CHECK} + "] in file [workflowEngine.log]");
	 flag = "fail";
		break;
	}
}
if (flag.equals("pass"))
{
 return true;
}
else
{
 return false;
} " /></inputs>

inputs.val: <inputs><inputs><pb_status class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">FAILED</pb_status><pb_failiure_message class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">Found unique string [xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_STRING_TO_CHECK}]in WorkflowEngine.log, when Logging was disabled. Test Failed.</pb_failiure_message></inputs><processBlock>ProcessBlock_5</processBlock><outputs /></inputs>
